data.textUthmani: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ
data.wordByWord: صٓ ۚ [Saad] وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ [By the Quran] ذِى [full (of) reminder] ٱلذِّكْرِ [full (of) reminder]
data.transliteration: Sad walqur-ani theeaththikr

data.textUthmani: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
data.wordByWord: بَلِ [Nay] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieve] فِى [(are) in] عِزَّةٍۢ [self-glory] وَشِقَاقٍۢ [and opposition]
data.transliteration: Bali allatheena kafaroo fee AAizzatinwashiqaq

data.textUthmani: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
data.wordByWord: كَمْ [How many] أَهْلَكْنَا [We destroyed] مِن [before them] قَبْلِهِم [before them] مِّن [of] قَرْنٍۢ [a generation] فَنَادَوا۟ [then they called out] وَّلَاتَ [when there (was) no longer] حِينَ [time] مَنَاصٍۢ [(for) escape]
data.transliteration: Kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarninfanadaw walata heena manas

data.textUthmani: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
data.wordByWord: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ [And they wonder] أَن [that] جَآءَهُم [has come to them] مُّنذِرٌۭ [a warner] مِّنْهُمْ ۖ [from themselves] وَقَالَ [And said] ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ [the disbelievers] هَـٰذَا [This] سَـٰحِرٌۭ [(is) a magician] كَذَّابٌ [a liar]
data.transliteration: WaAAajiboo an jaahum munthirunminhum waqala alkafiroona hatha sahirunkaththab

data.textUthmani: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ
data.wordByWord: أَجَعَلَ [Has he made] ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ [the gods] إِلَـٰهًۭا [(into) one god] وَٰحِدًا ۖ [(into) one god] إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] لَشَىْءٌ [(is) certainly a thing] عُجَابٌۭ [curious]
data.transliteration: AjaAAala al-alihata ilahan wahidaninna hatha lashay-on AAujab

data.textUthmani: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ
data.wordByWord: وَٱنطَلَقَ [And went forth] ٱلْمَلَأُ [the chiefs] مِنْهُمْ [among them] أَنِ [that] ٱمْشُوا۟ [Continue] وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ [and be patient] عَلَىٰٓ [over] ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ [your gods] إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] لَشَىْءٌۭ [(is) certainly a thing] يُرَادُ [intended]
data.transliteration: Wantalaqa almalao minhum aniimshoo wasbiroo AAala alihatikuminna hatha lashay-on yurad

data.textUthmani: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ
data.wordByWord: مَا [Not] سَمِعْنَا [we heard] بِهَـٰذَا [of this] فِى [in] ٱلْمِلَّةِ [the religion] ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [the last] إِنْ [Not] هَـٰذَآ [(is) this] إِلَّا [but] ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ [a fabrication]
data.transliteration: Ma samiAAna bihatha feealmillati al-akhirati in hatha illa ikhtilaq

data.textUthmani: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
data.wordByWord: أَءُنزِلَ [Has been revealed] عَلَيْهِ [to him] ٱلذِّكْرُ [the Message] مِنۢ [from] بَيْنِنَا ۚ [among us] بَلْ [Nay] هُمْ [They] فِى [(are) in] شَكٍّۢ [doubt] مِّن [about] ذِكْرِى ۖ [My Message] بَل [Nay] لَّمَّا [not yet] يَذُوقُوا۟ [they have tasted] عَذَابِ [My punishment]
data.transliteration: Aonzila AAalayhi aththikru minbaynina bal hum fee shakkin min thikree bal lammayathooqoo AAathab

data.textUthmani: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] عِندَهُمْ [have they] خَزَآئِنُ [(the) treasures] رَحْمَةِ [(of the) Mercy] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] ٱلْعَزِيزِ [the All-Mighty] ٱلْوَهَّابِ [the Bestower]
data.transliteration: Am AAindahum khaza-inu rahmatirabbika alAAazeezi alwahhab

data.textUthmani: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] لَهُم [for them] مُّلْكُ [(is the) dominion] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ [(is) between them] فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ [Then let them ascend] فِى [by] ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ [the means]
data.transliteration: Am lahum mulku assamawatiwal-ardi wama baynahuma falyartaqoofee al-asbab

data.textUthmani: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
data.wordByWord: جُندٌۭ [Soldiers ] مَّا [there] هُنَالِكَ [there] مَهْزُومٌۭ [(they will be) defeated] مِّنَ [among] ٱلْأَحْزَابِ [the companies]
data.transliteration: Jundun ma hunalika mahzoomunmina al-ahzab

data.textUthmani: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
data.wordByWord: كَذَّبَتْ [Denied] قَبْلَهُمْ [before them] قَوْمُ [(the) people] نُوحٍۢ [(of) Nuh] وَعَادٌۭ [and Aad] وَفِرْعَوْنُ [and Firaun] ذُو [(the) owner] ٱلْأَوْتَادِ [(of) the stakes]
data.transliteration: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohinwaAAadun wafirAAawnu thoo al-awtad

data.textUthmani: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
data.wordByWord: وَثَمُودُ [And Thamud] وَقَوْمُ [and (the) people] لُوطٍۢ [(of) Lut] وَأَصْحَـٰبُ [and (the) companions] لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ [(of) the wood] أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] ٱلْأَحْزَابُ [(were) the companies]
data.transliteration: Wathamoodu waqawmu lootin waas-habual-aykati ola-ika al-ahzab

data.textUthmani: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
data.wordByWord: إِن [Not] كُلٌّ [all (of them)] إِلَّا [but] كَذَّبَ [denied] ٱلرُّسُلَ [the Messengers] فَحَقَّ [so (was) just] عِقَابِ [My penalty]
data.transliteration: In kullun illa kaththaba arrusulafahaqqa AAiqab

data.textUthmani: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] يَنظُرُ [await] هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ [these] إِلَّا [but] صَيْحَةًۭ [a shout] وَٰحِدَةًۭ [one] مَّا [not] لَهَا [for it] مِن [any] فَوَاقٍۢ [delay]
data.transliteration: Wama yanthuru haola-iilla sayhatan wahidatan ma lahamin fawaq

data.textUthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
data.wordByWord: وَقَالُوا۟ [And they say] رَبَّنَا [Our Lord] عَجِّل [Hasten] لَّنَا [for us] قِطَّنَا [our share] قَبْلَ [before] يَوْمِ [(the) Day] ٱلْحِسَابِ [(of) the Account]
data.transliteration: Waqaloo rabbana AAajjil lanaqittana qabla yawmi alhisab

data.textUthmani: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
data.wordByWord: ٱصْبِرْ [Be patient] عَلَىٰ [over] مَا [what] يَقُولُونَ [they say] وَٱذْكُرْ [and remember] عَبْدَنَا [Our slave] دَاوُۥدَ [Dawood] ذَا [the possessor of strength] ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ [the possessor of strength] إِنَّهُۥٓ [Indeed, he (was)] أَوَّابٌ [repeatedly turning]
data.transliteration: Isbir AAala mayaqooloona wathkur AAabdana dawooda thaal-aydi innahu awwab

data.textUthmani: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] سَخَّرْنَا [subjected] ٱلْجِبَالَ [the mountains] مَعَهُۥ [with him] يُسَبِّحْنَ [glorifying] بِٱلْعَشِىِّ [in the evening] وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ [and [the] sunrise]
data.transliteration: Inna sakhkharna aljibalamaAAahu yusabbihna bilAAashiyyi wal-ishraq

data.textUthmani: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلطَّيْرَ [And the birds] مَحْشُورَةًۭ ۖ [assembled] كُلٌّۭ [all] لَّهُۥٓ [with him] أَوَّابٌۭ [repeatedly turning]
data.transliteration: Wattayra mahshooratankullun lahu awwab

data.textUthmani: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ
data.wordByWord: وَشَدَدْنَا [And We strengthened] مُلْكَهُۥ [his kingdom] وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ [and We gave him] ٱلْحِكْمَةَ [[the] wisdom] وَفَصْلَ [and decisive] ٱلْخِطَابِ [speech]
data.transliteration: Washadadna mulkahu waataynahualhikmata wafasla alkhitab

data.textUthmani: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ
data.wordByWord: ۞ وَهَلْ [And has (there)] أَتَىٰكَ [come to you] نَبَؤُا۟ [(the) news] ٱلْخَصْمِ [(of) the litigants] إِذْ [when] تَسَوَّرُوا۟ [they climbed over the wall] ٱلْمِحْرَابَ [(of) the chamber]
data.transliteration: Wahal ataka nabao alkhasmi ithtasawwaroo almihrab

data.textUthmani: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
data.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] دَخَلُوا۟ [they entered] عَلَىٰ [upon] دَاوُۥدَ [Dawood] فَفَزِعَ [and he was afraid] مِنْهُمْ ۖ [of them] قَالُوا۟ [they said] لَا [(Do) not] تَخَفْ ۖ [fear] خَصْمَانِ [(We are) two litigants] بَغَىٰ [has wronged] بَعْضُنَا [one of us] عَلَىٰ [to] بَعْضٍۢ [another] فَٱحْكُم [so judge] بَيْنَنَا [between us] بِٱلْحَقِّ [in truth] وَلَا [and (do) not] تُشْطِطْ [be unjust] وَٱهْدِنَآ [and guide us] إِلَىٰ [to] سَوَآءِ [an even] ٱلصِّرَٰطِ [[the] path]
data.transliteration: Ith dakhaloo AAala dawoodafafaziAAa minhum qaloo la takhaf khasmanibagha baAAduna AAala baAAdinfahkum baynana bilhaqqi walatushtit wahdina ila sawa-iassirat

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَآ [this] أَخِى [(is) my brother] لَهُۥ [he has] تِسْعٌۭ [ninety-nine] وَتِسْعُونَ [ninety-nine] نَعْجَةًۭ [ewe(s)] وَلِىَ [while I have] نَعْجَةٌۭ [ewe] وَٰحِدَةٌۭ [one] فَقَالَ [so he said] أَكْفِلْنِيهَا [Entrust her to me] وَعَزَّنِى [and he overpowered me] فِى [in] ٱلْخِطَابِ [[the] speech]
data.transliteration: Inna hatha akhee lahu tisAAunwatisAAoona naAAjatan waliya naAAjatun wahidatun faqalaakfilneeha waAAazzanee fee alkhitab

data.textUthmani: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] لَقَدْ [Certainly] ظَلَمَكَ [he has wronged you] بِسُؤَالِ [by demanding] نَعْجَتِكَ [your ewe] إِلَىٰ [to] نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ [his ewes] وَإِنَّ [And indeed] كَثِيرًۭا [many] مِّنَ [of] ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ [the partners] لَيَبْغِى [certainly oppress] بَعْضُهُمْ [some of them] عَلَىٰ [[on]] بَعْضٍ [another] إِلَّا [except] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ءَامَنُوا۟ [believe] وَعَمِلُوا۟ [and do] ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ [righteous deeds] وَقَلِيلٌۭ [and few] مَّا [(are) they] هُمْ ۗ [(are) they] وَظَنَّ [And became certain] دَاوُۥدُ [Dawood] أَنَّمَا [that] فَتَنَّـٰهُ [We (had) tried him] فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ [and he asked forgiveness] رَبَّهُۥ [(of) his Lord] وَخَرَّ [and fell down] رَاكِعًۭا [bowing] وَأَنَابَ ۩ [and turned in repentance]
data.transliteration: Qala laqad thalamakabisu-ali naAAjatika ila niAAajihi wa-innakatheeran mina alkhulata-i layabghee baAAduhum AAalabaAAdin illa allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati waqaleelun mahum wathanna dawoodu annama fatannahufastaghfara rabbahu wakharra rakiAAan waanab

data.textUthmani: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
data.wordByWord: فَغَفَرْنَا [So We forgave] لَهُۥ [for him] ذَٰلِكَ ۖ [that] وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لَهُۥ [for him] عِندَنَا [with Us] لَزُلْفَىٰ [surely is a near access] وَحُسْنَ [and a good] مَـَٔابٍۢ [place of return]
data.transliteration: Faghafarna lahu thalikawa-inna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maab

data.textUthmani: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ خَلِيفَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
data.wordByWord: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ [O Dawood] إِنَّا [Indeed, We] جَعَلْنَـٰكَ [[We] have made you] خَلِيفَةًۭ [a vicegerent] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] فَٱحْكُم [so judge] بَيْنَ [between] ٱلنَّاسِ [[the] men] بِٱلْحَقِّ [in truth] وَلَا [and (do) not] تَتَّبِعِ [follow] ٱلْهَوَىٰ [the desire] فَيُضِلَّكَ [for it will lead you astray] عَن [from] سَبِيلِ [(the) way] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [(of) Allah] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] يَضِلُّونَ [go astray] عَن [from] سَبِيلِ [(the) way] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] لَهُمْ [for them] عَذَابٌۭ [(is) a punishment] شَدِيدٌۢ [severe] بِمَا [because] نَسُوا۟ [they forgot] يَوْمَ [(the) Day] ٱلْحِسَابِ [(of) Account]
data.transliteration: Ya dawoodu inna jaAAalnakakhaleefatan fee al-ardi fahkum bayna annasibilhaqqi wala tattabiAAi alhawa fayudillakaAAan sabeeli Allahi inna allatheena yadilloonaAAan sabeeli Allahi lahum AAathabun shadeedun bimanasoo yawma alhisab

words.translation: for it will lead you astray

data.textUthmani: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَـٰطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] خَلَقْنَا [We created] ٱلسَّمَآءَ [the heaven] وَٱلْأَرْضَ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا [(is) between them] بَـٰطِلًۭا ۚ [without purpose] ذَٰلِكَ [That] ظَنُّ [(is the) assumption] ٱلَّذِينَ [(of) those who] كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ [disbelieve] فَوَيْلٌۭ [So woe] لِّلَّذِينَ [to those] كَفَرُوا۟ [who disbelieve] مِنَ [from] ٱلنَّارِ [the Fire]
data.transliteration: Wama khalaqna assamaawal-arda wama baynahuma batilanthalika thannu allatheena kafaroofawaylun lillatheena kafaroo mina annar

data.textUthmani: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] نَجْعَلُ [should We treat] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ءَامَنُوا۟ [believe] وَعَمِلُوا۟ [and do] ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ [righteous deeds] كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ [like those who spread corruption] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] أَمْ [Or] نَجْعَلُ [should We treat] ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ [the pious] كَٱلْفُجَّارِ [like the wicked]
data.transliteration: Am najAAalu allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati kalmufsideenafee al-ardi am najAAalu almuttaqeena kalfujjar

data.textUthmani: كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَـٰرَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
data.wordByWord: كِتَـٰبٌ [(This is) a Book] أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ [We have revealed it] إِلَيْكَ [to you] مُبَـٰرَكٌۭ [blessed] لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ [that they may ponder] ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ [(over) its Verses] وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ [and may be reminded] أُو۟لُوا۟ [those of understanding] ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ [those of understanding]
data.transliteration: Kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakunliyaddabbaroo ayatihi waliyatathakkara olooal-albab

data.textUthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
data.wordByWord: وَوَهَبْنَا [And We gave] لِدَاوُۥدَ [to Dawood] سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ [Sulaiman] نِعْمَ [an excellent] ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ [slave] إِنَّهُۥٓ [Indeed, he] أَوَّابٌ [(was) one who repeatedly turned]
data.transliteration: Wawahabna lidawooda sulaymananiAAma alAAabdu innahu awwab

data.textUthmani: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ
data.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] عُرِضَ [were displayed] عَلَيْهِ [to him] بِٱلْعَشِىِّ [in the afternoon] ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ [excellent bred steeds] ٱلْجِيَادُ [excellent bred steeds]
data.transliteration: Ith AAurida AAalayhi bilAAashiyyiassafinatu aljiyad

data.textUthmani: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ
data.wordByWord: فَقَالَ [And he said] إِنِّىٓ [Indeed, I] أَحْبَبْتُ [[I] preferred] حُبَّ [(the) love] ٱلْخَيْرِ [(of) the good] عَن [over] ذِكْرِ [(the) remembrance] رَبِّى [(of) my Lord] حَتَّىٰ [Until] تَوَارَتْ [they were hidden] بِٱلْحِجَابِ [in the veil]
data.transliteration: Faqala innee ahbabtu hubbaalkhayri AAan thikri rabbee hatta tawaratbilhijab

data.textUthmani: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ
data.wordByWord: رُدُّوهَا [Return them] عَلَىَّ ۖ [to me] فَطَفِقَ [Then he began] مَسْحًۢا [(to) pass (his hand)] بِٱلسُّوقِ [over the legs] وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ [and the necks]
data.transliteration: Ruddooha AAalayya fatafiqa mashanbissooqi wal-aAAnaq

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And certainly] فَتَنَّا [We tried] سُلَيْمَـٰنَ [Sulaiman] وَأَلْقَيْنَا [and We placed] عَلَىٰ [on] كُرْسِيِّهِۦ [his throne] جَسَدًۭا [a body] ثُمَّ [then] أَنَابَ [he turned]
data.transliteration: Walaqad fatanna sulaymanawaalqayna AAala kursiyyihi jasadan thumma anab

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [O my Lord] ٱغْفِرْ [Forgive] لِى [me] وَهَبْ [and grant] لِى [me] مُلْكًۭا [a kingdom] لَّا [not] يَنۢبَغِى [(will) belong] لِأَحَدٍۢ [to anyone] مِّنۢ [after me] بَعْدِىٓ ۖ [after me] إِنَّكَ [Indeed, You] أَنتَ [[You]] ٱلْوَهَّابُ [(are) the Bestower]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi ighfir lee wahab leemulkan la yanbaghee li-ahadin min baAAdee innakaanta alwahhab

data.textUthmani: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
data.wordByWord: فَسَخَّرْنَا [Then We subjected] لَهُ [to him] ٱلرِّيحَ [the wind] تَجْرِى [to flow] بِأَمْرِهِۦ [by his command] رُخَآءً [gently] حَيْثُ [wherever] أَصَابَ [he directed]
data.transliteration: Fasakhkharna lahu arreehatajree bi-amrihi rukhaan haythu asab

data.textUthmani: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ [And the devils] كُلَّ [every] بَنَّآءٍۢ [builder] وَغَوَّاصٍۢ [and diver]
data.transliteration: Washshayateena kulla banna-inwaghawwas

data.textUthmani: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ
data.wordByWord: وَءَاخَرِينَ [And others] مُقَرَّنِينَ [bound] فِى [in] ٱلْأَصْفَادِ [chains]
data.transliteration: Waakhareena muqarraneena fee al-asfad

data.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
data.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This] عَطَآؤُنَا [(is) Our gift] فَٱمْنُنْ [so grant] أَوْ [or] أَمْسِكْ [withhold] بِغَيْرِ [without] حِسَابٍۢ [account]
data.transliteration: Hatha AAataona famnunaw amsik bighayri hisab

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لَهُۥ [for him] عِندَنَا [with Us] لَزُلْفَىٰ [surely is a near access] وَحُسْنَ [and a good] مَـَٔابٍۢ [place of return]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna lahu AAindana lazulfawahusna maab

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And remember] عَبْدَنَآ [Our slave] أَيُّوبَ [Ayyub] إِذْ [when] نَادَىٰ [he called] رَبَّهُۥٓ [his Lord] أَنِّى [That [I]] مَسَّنِىَ [(has) touched me] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ [Shaitaan] بِنُصْبٍۢ [with distress] وَعَذَابٍ [and suffering]
data.transliteration: Wathkur AAabdanaayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya ashshaytanubinusbin waAAathab

data.textUthmani: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
data.wordByWord: ٱرْكُضْ [Strike] بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ [with your foot] هَـٰذَا [This] مُغْتَسَلٌۢ [(is a spring of) water to bathe] بَارِدٌۭ [cool] وَشَرَابٌۭ [and a drink]
data.transliteration: Orkud birijlika hathamughtasalun baridun washarab

words.translation: (is a spring of) water to bathe

data.textUthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
data.wordByWord: وَوَهَبْنَا [And We granted] لَهُۥٓ [[to] him] أَهْلَهُۥ [his family] وَمِثْلَهُم [and a like of them] مَّعَهُمْ [with them] رَحْمَةًۭ [a Mercy] مِّنَّا [from Us] وَذِكْرَىٰ [and a Reminder] لِأُو۟لِى [for those of understanding] ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ [for those of understanding]
data.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamithlahummaAAahum rahmatan minna wathikrali-olee al-albab

data.textUthmani: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
data.wordByWord: وَخُذْ [And take] بِيَدِكَ [in your hand] ضِغْثًۭا [a bunch] فَٱضْرِب [and strike] بِّهِۦ [with it] وَلَا [and (do) not] تَحْنَثْ ۗ [break (your) oath] إِنَّا [Indeed, We] وَجَدْنَـٰهُ [[We] found him] صَابِرًۭا ۚ [patient] نِّعْمَ [an excellent] ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ [slave] إِنَّهُۥٓ [Indeed, he] أَوَّابٌۭ [repeatedly turned]
data.transliteration: Wakhuth biyadika dighthan fadribbihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiranniAAma alAAabdu innahu awwab

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And remember] عِبَـٰدَنَآ [Our slaves] إِبْرَٰهِيمَ [Ibrahim] وَإِسْحَـٰقَ [and Isaac] وَيَعْقُوبَ [and Ayyub] أُو۟لِى [possessors] ٱلْأَيْدِى [(of) strength] وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ [and vision]
data.transliteration: Wathkur AAibadanaibraheema wa-ishaqa wayaAAqooba olee al-aydee wal-absar

data.textUthmani: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّآ [Indeed, We] أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم [[We] chose them] بِخَالِصَةٍۢ [for an exclusive (quality)] ذِكْرَى [remembrance] ٱلدَّارِ [(of) the Home]
data.transliteration: Inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatinthikra addar

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّهُمْ [And indeed, they] عِندَنَا [to Us] لَمِنَ [(are) from] ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ [the chosen ones] ٱلْأَخْيَارِ [the best]
data.transliteration: Wa-innahum AAindana lamina almustafaynaal-akhyar

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And remember] إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ [Ishmael] وَٱلْيَسَعَ [and Elisha] وَذَا [and Dhul-kifl] ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ [and Dhul-kifl] وَكُلٌّۭ [and all] مِّنَ [(are) from] ٱلْأَخْيَارِ [the best]
data.transliteration: Wathkur ismaAAeelawa-ilyasaAAa watha alkifli wakullun mina al-akhyar

data.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
data.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This] ذِكْرٌۭ ۚ [(is) a Reminder] وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لِلْمُتَّقِينَ [for the righteous] لَحُسْنَ [surely, is a good] مَـَٔابٍۢ [place of return]
data.transliteration: Hatha thikrun wa-innalilmuttaqeena lahusna maab

data.textUthmani: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ
data.wordByWord: جَنَّـٰتِ [Gardens] عَدْنٍۢ [(of) Eternity] مُّفَتَّحَةًۭ [(will be) opened] لَّهُمُ [for them] ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ [the gates]
data.transliteration: Jannati AAadnin mufattahatanlahumu al-abwab

data.textUthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
data.wordByWord: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ [Reclining] فِيهَا [therein] يَدْعُونَ [they will call] فِيهَا [therein] بِفَـٰكِهَةٍۢ [for fruit] كَثِيرَةٍۢ [many] وَشَرَابٍۢ [and drink]
data.transliteration: Muttaki-eena feeha yadAAoona feehabifakihatin katheeratin washarab

data.textUthmani: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
data.wordByWord: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ [And with them] قَـٰصِرَٰتُ [(will be) companions of modest gaze] ٱلطَّرْفِ [(will be) companions of modest gaze] أَتْرَابٌ [well-matched]
data.transliteration: WaAAindahum qasiratu attarfiatrab

data.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
data.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This] مَا [(is) what] تُوعَدُونَ [you are promised] لِيَوْمِ [for (the) Day] ٱلْحِسَابِ [(of) Account]
data.transliteration: Hatha ma tooAAadoona liyawmialhisab

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] لَرِزْقُنَا [(is) surely Our provision] مَا [not] لَهُۥ [for it] مِن [any] نَّفَادٍ [depletion]
data.transliteration: Inna hatha larizquna malahu min nafad

data.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّـٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍ
data.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا ۚ [This (is so)] وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لِلطَّـٰغِينَ [for the transgressors] لَشَرَّ [surely (is) an evil] مَـَٔابٍۢ [place of return]
data.transliteration: Hatha wa-inna littagheenalasharra maab

data.textUthmani: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
data.wordByWord: جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] يَصْلَوْنَهَا [they will burn therein] فَبِئْسَ [and wretched (is)] ٱلْمِهَادُ [the resting place]
data.transliteration: Jahannama yaslawnaha fabi/saalmihad

data.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
data.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This (is so)] فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ [Then let them taste it] حَمِيمٌۭ [boiling fluid] وَغَسَّاقٌۭ [and purulence]
data.transliteration: Hatha falyathooqoohu hameemunwaghassaq

data.textUthmani: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ
data.wordByWord: وَءَاخَرُ [And other] مِن [of] شَكْلِهِۦٓ [its type] أَزْوَٰجٌ [(of various) kinds]
data.transliteration: Waakharu min shaklihi azwaj

data.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
data.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This] فَوْجٌۭ [(is) a company] مُّقْتَحِمٌۭ [bursting] مَّعَكُمْ ۖ [(in) with you] لَا [No] مَرْحَبًۢا [welcome] بِهِمْ ۚ [for them] إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, they] صَالُوا۟ [(will) burn] ٱلنَّارِ [(in) the Fire]
data.transliteration: Hatha fawjun muqtahimunmaAAakum la marhaban bihim innahum saloo annar

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They say] بَلْ [Nay] أَنتُمْ [You ] لَا [no] مَرْحَبًۢا [welcome] بِكُمْ ۖ [for you] أَنتُمْ [You] قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ [brought this] لَنَا ۖ [upon us] فَبِئْسَ [So wretched (is)] ٱلْقَرَارُ [the settlement]
data.transliteration: Qaloo bal antum la marhabanbikum antum qaddamtumoohu lana fabi/sa alqarar

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They will say] رَبَّنَا [Our Lord] مَن [whoever] قَدَّمَ [brought] لَنَا [upon us] هَـٰذَا [this] فَزِدْهُ [increase for him] عَذَابًۭا [a punishment] ضِعْفًۭا [double] فِى [in] ٱلنَّارِ [the Fire]
data.transliteration: Qaloo rabbana man qaddama lanahatha fazidhu AAathaban diAAfan fee annar

data.textUthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ
data.wordByWord: وَقَالُوا۟ [And they (will) say] مَا [What (is)] لَنَا [for us] لَا [not] نَرَىٰ [we see] رِجَالًۭا [men] كُنَّا [we used to] نَعُدُّهُم [count them] مِّنَ [among] ٱلْأَشْرَارِ [the bad ones]
data.transliteration: Waqaloo ma lana lanara rijalan kunna naAAudduhum mina al-ashrar

data.textUthmani: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ
data.wordByWord: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ [Did we take them] سِخْرِيًّا [(in) ridicule] أَمْ [or] زَاغَتْ [has turned away] عَنْهُمُ [from them] ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ [the vision]
data.transliteration: Attakhathnahum sikhriyyan am zaghatAAanhumu al-absar

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَحَقٌّۭ [(is) surely (the) truth ] تَخَاصُمُ [(the) quarreling] أَهْلِ [(of the) people] ٱلنَّارِ [(of) the Fire]
data.transliteration: Inna thalika lahaqqun takhasumuahli annar

data.textUthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] إِنَّمَآ [Only] أَنَا۠ [I am] مُنذِرٌۭ ۖ [a warner] وَمَا [and not] مِنْ [(is there) any] إِلَـٰهٍ [god] إِلَّا [except] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] ٱلْوَٰحِدُ [the One] ٱلْقَهَّارُ [the Irresistible]
data.transliteration: Qul innama ana munthirunwama min ilahin illa Allahu alwahidualqahhar

data.textUthmani: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
data.wordByWord: رَبُّ [Lord] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا [(is) between them] ٱلْعَزِيزُ [the All-Mighty] ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ [the Oft-Forgiving]
data.transliteration: Rabbu assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma alAAazeezu alghaffar

data.textUthmani: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] هُوَ [It (is)] نَبَؤٌا۟ [a news] عَظِيمٌ [great]
data.transliteration: Qul huwa nabaon AAatheem

data.textUthmani: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَنتُمْ [You] عَنْهُ [from it] مُعْرِضُونَ [turn away]
data.transliteration: Antum AAanhu muAAridoon

data.textUthmani: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
data.wordByWord: مَا [Not] كَانَ [is] لِىَ [for me] مِنْ [any] عِلْمٍۭ [knowledge] بِٱلْمَلَإِ [(of) the chiefs] ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ [the exalted] إِذْ [when] يَخْتَصِمُونَ [they were disputing]
data.transliteration: Ma kana liya min AAilmin bilmala-ial-aAAla ith yakhtasimoon

data.textUthmani: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
data.wordByWord: إِن [Not] يُوحَىٰٓ [has been revealed] إِلَىَّ [to me] إِلَّآ [except] أَنَّمَآ [that only] أَنَا۠ [I am] نَذِيرٌۭ [a warner] مُّبِينٌ [clear]
data.transliteration: In yooha ilayya illa annamaana natheerun mubeen

data.textUthmani: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ
data.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] قَالَ [said] رَبُّكَ [your Lord] لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ [to the Angels] إِنِّى [Indeed, I Am] خَـٰلِقٌۢ [going to create] بَشَرًۭا [a human being] مِّن [from] طِينٍۢ [clay]
data.transliteration: Ith qala rabbuka lilmala-ikatiinnee khaliqun basharan min teen

data.textUthmani: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَإِذَا [So when] سَوَّيْتُهُۥ [I have proportioned him] وَنَفَخْتُ [and breathed] فِيهِ [into him] مِن [of] رُّوحِى [My spirit] فَقَعُوا۟ [then fall down] لَهُۥ [to him] سَـٰجِدِينَ [prostrating]
data.transliteration: Fa-itha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehimin roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideen

data.textUthmani: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَسَجَدَ [So prostrated] ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ [the Angels] كُلُّهُمْ [all of them] أَجْمَعُونَ [together]
data.transliteration: Fasajada almala-ikatu kulluhumajmaAAoon

data.textUthmani: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِلَّآ [Except] إِبْلِيسَ [Iblis] ٱسْتَكْبَرَ [he was arrogant] وَكَانَ [and became] مِنَ [of] ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [the disbelievers]
data.transliteration: Illa ibleesa istakbara wakanamina alkafireen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ [O Iblis] مَا [What] مَنَعَكَ [prevented you] أَن [that] تَسْجُدَ [you (should) prostrate] لِمَا [to (one) whom] خَلَقْتُ [I created] بِيَدَىَّ ۖ [with My Hands] أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ [Are you arrogant] أَمْ [or] كُنتَ [are you] مِنَ [of] ٱلْعَالِينَ [the exalted ones]
data.transliteration: Qala ya ibleesu mamanaAAaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta amkunta mina alAAaleen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] أَنَا۠ [I am] خَيْرٌۭ [better] مِّنْهُ ۖ [than him] خَلَقْتَنِى [You created me] مِن [from] نَّارٍۢ [fire] وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ [and You created him] مِن [from] طِينٍۢ [clay]
data.transliteration: Qala ana khayrun minhukhalaqtanee min narin wakhalaqtahu min teen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] فَٱخْرُجْ [Then get out] مِنْهَا [of it] فَإِنَّكَ [for indeed, you] رَجِيمٌۭ [(are) accursed]
data.transliteration: Qala fakhruj minhafa-innaka rajeem

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] عَلَيْكَ [upon you] لَعْنَتِىٓ [(is) My curse] إِلَىٰ [until] يَوْمِ [(the) Day] ٱلدِّينِ [(of) Judgment]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna AAalayka laAAnatee ila yawmiaddeen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ [Then give me respite] إِلَىٰ [until] يَوْمِ [(the) Day] يُبْعَثُونَ [they are resurrected]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi faanthirneeila yawmi yubAAathoon

data.textUthmani: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] فَإِنَّكَ [Then indeed, you] مِنَ [(are) of] ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ [those given respite]
data.transliteration: Qala fa-innaka mina almunthareen

data.textUthmani: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
data.wordByWord: إِلَىٰ [Until] يَوْمِ [(the) Day] ٱلْوَقْتِ [(of) the time] ٱلْمَعْلُومِ [well-known]
data.transliteration: Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloom

data.textUthmani: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] فَبِعِزَّتِكَ [Then by Your might] لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ [I will surely mislead them] أَجْمَعِينَ [all]
data.transliteration: Qala fabiAAizzatika laoghwiyannahumajmaAAeen

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] عِبَادَكَ [Your slaves] مِنْهُمُ [among them] ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ [the chosen ones]
data.transliteration: Illa AAibadaka minhumualmukhlaseen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] فَٱلْحَقُّ [Then (it is) the truth] وَٱلْحَقَّ [and the truth] أَقُولُ [I say]
data.transliteration: Qala falhaqqu walhaqqaaqool

data.textUthmani: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
data.wordByWord: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ [Surely I will fill] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] مِنكَ [with you] وَمِمَّن [and those who] تَبِعَكَ [follow you] مِنْهُمْ [among them] أَجْمَعِينَ [all]
data.transliteration: Laamlaanna jahannama minka wamimmantabiAAaka minhum ajmaAAeen

data.textUthmani: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] مَآ [Not] أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ [I ask of you] عَلَيْهِ [for it] مِنْ [any] أَجْرٍۢ [payment] وَمَآ [and not] أَنَا۠ [I am] مِنَ [of] ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ [the ones who pretend]
data.transliteration: Qul ma as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrinwama ana mina almutakallifeen

data.textUthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنْ [Not] هُوَ [it (is)] إِلَّا [except] ذِكْرٌۭ [a Reminder] لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ [to the worlds]
data.transliteration: In huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameen

data.textUthmani: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ
data.wordByWord: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ [And surely you will know] نَبَأَهُۥ [its information] بَعْدَ [after] حِينٍۭ [a time]
data.transliteration: WalataAAlamunna nabaahu baAAda heen
